article.title: Derivatives and Integrals
article.author: Robert Beezer
article.department: Department of Mathematics and Computer Science
article.p: We consider integrals of functions f(x). For example, \int_0^1\,\sin^2(x)\,dx

statement.p: If f(x) is continuous, and the derivative of F(x) is f(x), then \int_a^b\,f(x)\,dx=F(b)-F(a)
